userId.description: Existing user id. Mutually exclusive with user

UserPassInfo.description: Simple pass information containing template and pass IDs

API-Token.description: API Token fr externe Integrationen. Format: sk_live_...

info.description:
## Available Scopes

### template
- `template:read` - Templates lesen
- `template:create` - Templates erstellen
- `template:update` - Templates aktualisieren
- `template:delete` - Templates lschen

### pass
- `pass:read` - Wallet Passes lesen
- `pass:create` - Wallet Passes erstellen
- `pass:update` - Wallet Passes aktualisieren
- `pass:delete` - Wallet Passes lschen

### loyalty
- `loyalty:manage` - Stempel/Punkte verwalten (hinzufgen, entfernen, einlsen)

### user
- `user:read` - User lesen
- `user:create` - User erstellen
- `user:update` - User aktualisieren

### org
- `org:read` - Organisation lesen
- `org:update` - Organisation aktualisieren (Name, Slug, etc.)
- `org:delete` - Organisation lschen
- `org:settings:read` - Org-Einstellungen lesen
- `org:settings:update` - Org-Einstellungen ndern
- `org:members:read` - Org-Mitglieder lesen
- `org:members:manage` - Org-Mitglieder verwalten (hinzufgen, entfernen, Rollen ndern)

### api_token
- `api_token:manage` - API Tokens verwalten

### app
- `app:read` - Apps lesen
- `app:manage` - Apps verwalten (erstellen, bearbeiten, verffentlichen)

### notification
- `notification:send` - Push-Nachrichten an Wallet-Psse senden

**Auth Methods:** JWT

**Auth Methods:** JWT

**Required Scopes:** `api_token:manage`

get.description:
Returns the JSON Web Key Set (JWKS) containing the public key used to sign session tokens.
            Apps can use this endpoint to retrieve the public key for token verification.

            The key is returned in JWK format with:
            - kty: Key type (RSA)
            - use: Key usage (sig = signature)
            - alg: Algorithm (RS256)
            - kid: Key ID
            - n: RSA modulus (Base64URL encoded)
            - e: RSA exponent (Base64URL encoded)

post.description:
Generate a short-lived JWT session token for an embedded app iframe.

            The token is signed with RS256 (RSA asymmetric signing),
            allowing apps to verify it using the public key from /v1/apps/bridge/.well-known/jwks.json

            Token claims:
            - iss: Stemp issuer URL
            - aud: App ID (audience, e.g. app_xxx)
            - sub: Installation ID (subject)
            - org: Organization ID
            - scopes: Granted scopes
            - user: Current user/member ID
            - iat: Issued at timestamp
            - exp: Expiration timestamp (1 minute)

            Apps should validate:
            1. Signature using the public key from JWKS endpoint
            2. iss matches expected Stemp issuer
            3. aud matches their app ID (app_xxx)
            4. exp is in the future

get.description: OAuth2 Organization Info endpoint - returns organization info for the authenticated installation. Requires app installation authentication (Basic or Bearer). Available at both /orginfo and /userinfo (standard OAuth2 endpoint name).

post.description: Exchange a refresh token for a new access token. Returns new access token and optionally a new refresh token (if close to expiry). Supports both application/json and application/x-www-form-urlencoded.
Exchange authorization code for installation credentials. Supports both application/json and application/x-www-form-urlencoded.
